feed.title: The legal risks of auto-updating wallet software; custodial relationships

entry.title: The legal risks of auto-updating wallet software; custodial relationships
entry.summary: In this communication, Tamas Blummer suggests that the legal hurdle to force confiscation through a wallet provider might be lower if the target user is not domestic. Depending on the threat model, the incentive to force confiscation might also be lower. The email is signed by Justus Ranvier, with his public key ID provided, and includes an attachment named 0xEAD9E623.asc which is an application/pgp-keys file with a size of 17528 bytes.
